com.fgc.http.engine

类 HttpEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fgc.http.engine.HttpEngine

  • public class HttpEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    main class of http engine.
    作者:
    FGC

      方法

      void installFileCache(FileCache cache)
      install a cache for file requesting (which can not support breakpoint resume download mode.)

      show http engine debug log or not.

      • needDebug

        public void needDebug(boolean isNeed)
        show http engine debug log or not.
        参数:
        isNeed -

      • init

        public void init()
        must be called before all operation.

      • uninit

        public void uninit()
        must be called when you application finished.

      • installFileCache

        public void installFileCache(FileCache cache)
        install a cache for file requesting (which can not support breakpoint resume download mode.)
        参数:
        cache - a instance that implements FileCache interface

      • requestString

        public Controller requestString(StringRequest req,
                       HttpEngine.StringObserver observer)
        request a string
        参数:
        req - see StringRequest
        observer -
        返回:
        A Controller which can terminate the task

                     HttpEngine.FileObserver observer)

        req - see FileRequest
        observer -
